author: remm
msg: - Second attempt with my own patch. (note: we don't care about efficiency here, since this is not used often at all)

author: remm
msg: - 34840: Found a way to tweak behavior when using an external WAR.
- Ignore docBase if the context is inside the host appBase, as it is duplicated by the context file name. Not doing so creates a mess in some cases.

author: markt
msg: Include request body in saved request when using FORM authentication.
- Fixes problem with saved request assuming platform default encoding for POSTed
- Improves restoration of request by using CoyoteRequest
